violations.description: Ensure the order of headings is semantically correct
violations.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Heading order invalid

violations.description: Ensure elements have alternative text or a role of none or presentation

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element does not have an alt attribute
  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
  Element has no title attribute
  Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none" or role="presentation"

violations.description: Ensure interactive controls are not nested as they are not always announced by screen readers or can cause focus problems for assistive technologies
violations.help: Interactive controls must not be nested

nodes.html: <div data-di-id="Mobilabonnement" tabindex="0" role="button" class="_teddy-grid_1dv1t_2 _teddy-card_vxy5c_3 _teddy-card--beige-light_vxy5c_309 undefined _teddy-card--layout_vxy5c_61 _teddy-card--navigation-vertical_vxy5c_102 main-category-card">
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Using a negative tabindex on an element inside an interactive control does not prevent assistive technologies from focusing the element (even with aria-hidden="true")
